div.bibl: Daily Jewish Courier, July 2, 1919. SAMUEL PHILLIPSON BECOMES A SUBSCRIBER TO BETH HAMEDROSH L'RABONIM

body.p: Mr. Samuel Phillipson has become a subscriber to the Beth Hamedrosh L'Rabonin (Theological Seminary) on Grenshaw Street, contributing an annual sum of $200. The well-known merchant and philanthropist sent his subscription for this year to Rabbi Ephriam Epstein yesterday.
